advancement.cardcraft.all_legend_of_whit: Collect every Card in 'Legend of White Eyes'
advancement.cardcraft.dice_and_coin.desc: Get a Coin and Die for your random needs
Get your hands on the Official Rulebook
advancement.cardcraft.root.description: Side effects may include: A compulsive need to open Booster Packs constantly...
cardcraft.card_text.illegal_card: Cannot be used in Official Duels
cardcraft.official_rulebook.category.col: CardCraft is a Mod about collecting things. Primarily, this is in the form of Trading Cards
cardcraft.official_rulebook.category.gam: Currently, this section is being developed and has no useful information$(br)$(br)It will contain information on how to play the CardCraft game, turns, card details, rulings, and more. Stay tuned!
Cards are the core of this Mod (I mean, yeah. No duh). You can primarily get them from Boosters (and in the future, Villagers).$(br)$(br)Currently, they don't do anything, but soon you can use your cards to play a game with your friends! Stay tuned!
cardcraft.official_rulebook.entry.booste: Booster Packs are your entry into collecting cards. They can be found in Village houses and Dungeons$(br)$(br)Each pack can hold 3 cards of different rarities: Common (50%), Uncommon (30%), Rare (15%), and Epic (5%)$(br)$(br)TODO: FIX FORMAT ERROR ON THIS SPECIFIC PAGE
cardcraft.official_rulebook.entry.dice_a: Sometimes, you need to make a decision between multiple outcomes. Or maybe you need to decide on an effect or who will do what$(br)$(br)That's where Dice and Coins come in! These lovely little gizmos can help anyone decide on anything. They are mainly used in the card game itself, but it might be nice to have for other things as well
cardcraft.official_rulebook.entry.introd: Welcome to the CardCraft TCG! Here you can find all of the information you need to play the game and have fun!$(br)$(br)Currently, this section is under development. It will contain some cool stuff later on...
cardcraft.official_rulebook.entry.gettin: Currently under development. Check back later
cardcraft.official_rulebook.landing_text: Welcome to CardCraft!$(br)$(br)Here you can find information relating to the mod, whether that be about Cards, where to find certain items, or even how to play the game!$(br)$(br)If you found any bugs or want to suggest something, join my $(l:https://discord.gg/kEkMdv232X)Discord!$(/l)
cardcraft.official_rulebook.name: Official Rulebook
item.cardcraft.angry_vex_trading_card.fl: One has to wonder how he was able to shrink a sword | WHEY-EN18
item.cardcraft.apple_trading_card.effect: Target one Mob you control. It regains Stamina, then if was added to your hand by the effect of 'Notch', it also gains +3 HP
item.cardcraft.apple_trading_card.flavor: A healthy snack, perfect for any scenario | WHEY-EN15
item.cardcraft.archer_of_the_swamp_tradi: Ranger | This Mob's Battle Target gains Poison after Battle
It constantly see rainbows as a result of having mushrooms growing into it's skull | WHEY-EN05
During Battle, flip two coins. If both are heads, this mob doesn't take damage from that Battle
Many Endermen specialize in stealing lawns and placing them underground | WHEY-EN22
item.cardcraft.book_of_looting_trading_c: Some people wonder what this book does, even though the contents are quite simple to read | WHEY-EN11
item.cardcraft.brooding_piglin_trading_c: A lone Piglin looking for his missing Gold Sword | WHEY-EN02
item.cardcraft.cleaner_allay_trading_car: Discard one Item, then search your deck for an Item and add it to your hand
It has one goal in life: Clean up after people | WHEY-EN17
item.cardcraft.cry_of_the_undead_trading: The undead are always looking for more victims to add to their ranks | WHEY-EN12
item.cardcraft.decaying_steed_trading_ca: Transport 1 | Mobs or Heroes being Transported by this Mob inflict Poison after Battle
The preferred mode of transportation for an undead army | WHEY-EN23
item.cardcraft.dev_trading_card.type: Dev - Ultimate Super Card of Doom
item.cardcraft.feared_scream_trading_car: Kill Mob targeted during the End Phase
Target one Mob you control. It gains Unblockable this turn
Some Mobs are able to make a sound so disturbing, they are left alone to do what they want | WHEY-EN30
item.cardcraft.frosted_ballman_trading_c: It tries it's best, even though it doesn't do it's job well | WHEY-EN09
item.cardcraft.glow_of_the_deep_trading_: One theory states that Glow Squids may contain Radium, which causes them and anything their ink touches to glow | WHEY-EN20
item.cardcraft.guide_to_better_farming_t: Add one Food from your deck to your hand
Most people don't know how to grow their own food. That's where this handy guide comes in! | WHEY-EN27
item.cardcraft.heated_jumper_trading_car: This Mob's Battle Target gains Burning (after Damage Calculation) | If this Mob dies, spawn two Magma Cube Tokens (1 HP, 2/2)
They hold the record for the highest jump in the Blocklympics | WHEY-EN19
item.cardcraft.hungry_camel_trading_card: Transport 2 | Mobs or Heroes being transported by this Mob cannot be attacked by non-Rangers | If this Mob was given Food this turn, it gains +2 HP
It's favorite food is Cactus Rolls, mixed with a hint of Sugar | WHEY-EN16
item.cardcraft.iced_marksman_trading_car: Ranger | This Mob's Battle Target gains Slowness after Battle
The extreme of the Tundra claim the lives of many | WHEY-EN13
item.cardcraft.iron_toe_boots_trading_ca: Working with anything heavy requires the proper footwear. Otherwise, you might end up flat-footed | WHEY-EN29
item.cardcraft.jam_the_frog_trading_card: Target one Mob you control. This Mob gains target Mob's ATK
No, it's still not a valid target | WHEY-EN08
item.cardcraft.legend_of_white_eyes_boos: Legend of White Eyes | %s Cards per Booster Pack
item.cardcraft.lil_gerald_trading_card.f: He's a lil guy, doing lil things | WHEY-EN01
item.cardcraft.living_box_trading_card.e: Ranger | During Battle, flip a coin. If heads, this Mob cannot attack and gains +3 HP
item.cardcraft.living_box_trading_card.f: Removing the core makes for a great portable storage solution | WHEY-EN21
item.cardcraft.menace_of_the_stars_tradi: It knows when you aren't sleeping. It knows when you are working. It knows if you are doing something important, so sleep | WHEY-EN25
item.cardcraft.muscle_builder_trading_ca: Target Mob you control gains 2x DMG
Now with more Protein! Starting at the low price of your right Kidney! | WHEY-EN28
item.cardcraft.nope_the_fish_trading_car: Equip | Equipped Mob gains +1 DMG and Double Swing
Why did we fol- wait what's this doing here | WHEY-EN06
item.cardcraft.notch_trading_card.effect: Kill one Mob you control, then take control of one Mob an opponent controls | If this Hero dies, search your deck for a Food and add it to your hand
item.cardcraft.notch_trading_card.flavor: His dead brother is rumored to be haunting the people of the Overworld. But Notch denies this, even with overwhelming evidence saying otherwise | WHEY-EN14
item.cardcraft.official_rulebook.details: Contains information about getting Booster Packs, Card Information, how to play CardCraft, and more!
Looks like some idiot forgot to turn on the functionality of this. Please report
Patchouli appears to be missing. Please install version 1.20.1-81-FORGE in order to view the contents of this book
item.cardcraft.repeater_crossbow_trading: Equip | Equipped Mob gains Ranger and Double Swing
The signature weapon of Pillager soldiers, made with speed and lethality in mind | WHEY-EN26
item.cardcraft.sharpboned_scrooge_tradin: It's looking for a certain Human to use as target practice | WHEY-EN03
item.cardcraft.smoking_launcher_trading_: Ranger, Triple Swing | During each Battle, flip 3 Coins. Lose one Swing for each Tails result | This mob's Battle Target gains Burning after Battle
A blazing creature capable of shooting fireballs with precision | WHEY-EN07
item.cardcraft.sonic_screecher_trading_c: The only thing more annoying than a flying rat is a loud flying rat | WHEY-EN10
item.cardcraft.special_d1.secret_message: ... You know, there are things in the universe that you have to ask yourself: "Why? Why is this the way it is?" This moment right here is a perfect example of that. There should be no reason that someone would want to roll for an outcome with only one possible result. Why does a D1 exist? What's even the purpose? It makes no sense. Are you just THAT indecisive about ONE THING that you need something with a 100% outcome to tell you? Kinda sad, not gonna lie... Oh well... Anyways, since you got this message, have this. You can't really use it, but it's something cool to show off... now make a good decision and roll a normal dice...
item.cardcraft.stick_man_trading_card.fl: He's running from a certain Skeleton who wants to use him as target practice | WHEY-EN04
These cats were tamed long ago, but now are left to their own devices | WHEY-EN24
